content: crochet hook into the loops back-front instead of front-back 4 feet x2 yellow yarn 1 chain 3 slip_stitch 2 x 3 sc3tog chain 2 slip_stitch 2 fasten_off sew to connect to the beginning of the round and sew onto the body tail brown yarn 1 magic_ring 4 4 2 single_crochet 2 increase x 2 6 3 single_crochet increase x 3 9 4 bind off and sew on to body eyes black yarn embroider eyes on either side of the beak 1 thread tapestry needle 2 push into side of head and pull out on top of where right eye is to be 3 find bottom bottom of right eye two row down push needle in and pull out at same place as the of the right eye 4 repeat 2-3 times as desired 5 stick needle in at bottom of right eye and pull it out wherever you want the top of left eye to be 6 find bottom bottom of left eye two row down push needle in and pull out at same place as the of the left eye 7 repeat step 6 two or three times as desired 8 push needle in at bottom of left eye and pull out at entrance of yarn tail 9 tie ends together and then use crochet hook to hide knot inside amigurumi 5
